flawed_nl_solution:
Bert was able to earn 8 x $18 = $<<8*18=414>>414 for the toy phones.
While Tory was able to earn 7 x $20 = $<<7*20=140>>140 for the toy guns.
Therefore, Bert was able to earn $414 – $140 = $<<414-140=274>>274 more than Tory.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 144, not 414. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
